eventBySlug.name: Sweat And Splash (Fitness Class)
eventBySlug.short_description: On Saturday, June 29th, starting at 8:30 AM. Go check out this event at Piedmont Park!
eventBySlug.description:
Participate in this unique and awesome opportunity to workout at Piedmont Park's pool! 
This 90 minute strength building, core sculpting, heart pumping pool workout is perfect for the reaching your fitness goals! Be prepared for for a circuit-training, total-body class for the first 45 minutes of class (wear tennis shoes). Please bring swimwear for the second half of class. 
8 WEEK SERIES
Saturdays, June 1-July 27 (No class June 22)
8:30am to 10:00am
*August 3rd is a possible makeup date, if needed 
Location: Piedmont Park Aquatic Center 
1 Class - $30 

Registration: https://apm.activecommunities.com/piedmontpark/Activity_Search/sweat-and-splash-2019-1-class/610

8 Classes - $210 

Registration: https://apm.activecommunities.com/piedmontpark/Activity_Search/sweat-and-splash-2019-8-classes/611
